title: Bug 19089: No Popup Menu in Java Editor Ruler (Photon)
description: The bug report describes an issue where the expected popup menu in the Java editor ruler is not appearing in the Photon version.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. Although it should trigger a popup menu to add breakpoints, marks, etc., no such menu appears.
EB: The expected behavior is that when a Java editor is open in the Photon version, right-clicking on the left vertical ruler should trigger a popup menu. This menu should provide options to add breakpoints, marks, and other relevant functionalities. However, in the reported case, the expected popup menu does not appear.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected outcome is that a popup menu will appear, allowing you to add breakpoints and marks. However, in the Photon version, this popup menu is missing.
